title: YouTube was partially down this afternoon, mainly on smart TV apps [Updated]
content:
On the afternoon of April 12, 2022, it appears that both YouTube and YouTube TV are seeing a partial outage that has taken down some portions of each service.

Update: YouTube has fixed this outage.

moreâ€¦

The post YouTube was partially down this afternoon, mainly on smart TV apps [Updated] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: An outage has hit YouTube on the afternoon of April 12, taking down the smart TV app and web apps along with YouTube TV for some.
